name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ekko X Powder Watching Fireworks Arcane 2: Live Wallpaper for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your Chrome with this stunning live wallpaper featuring Ekko and Powder watching fireworks from Arcane 2!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This captivating live wallpaper brings the vibrant world of Ekko and Powder to your desktop, adding dynamic, colorful fireworks to your browsing experience. With every glance, you’ll be transported into the thrilling universe of Arcane, where the characters come to life amidst breathtaking explosions of light. Not only does it look amazing, but it’s also packed with features to make your browsing even better.

The extension includes a handy Google search bar right on your new live wallpaper, making it quick and easy to access your favorite websites. You’ll also find shortcuts to popular sites like YouTube, Facebook, and Twitter, all at your fingertips. Plus, the wallpaper keeps you up-to-date with real-time information, displaying the current date and time, so you’ll never miss a moment while enjoying the stunning visuals.

Make your browsing experience unforgettable with Ekko X Powder Watching Fireworks Arcane 2! Download now and enjoy a beautiful and functional live wallpaper every day.
